title: RepoWizSample Object Mapping
description: Mapping schema for metadata of the RepoWizSample object

sample name.description: Arbitrary unique identifier (internal reference, not shown) e.g Sample1, Sample2 ,...

characteristics.description: Biosource characteristic (label) with the value of the sample

molecule.description: Type of molecule extracted from biological material

sample description.description: Additional information not provided in the other fields

processed data file.description: Name of the file containing the processed data

growth protocol.description: Conditions that were used to grow or maintain organisms or cells prior to extract preparation.

treatment protocol.description: Treatments applied to the biological material prior to extract preparation.

extract protocol.description: Protocols used to extract and prepare the material to be sequenced

sequencing type.description: Type of sequencing used for samples

data processing step.description: Details/steps of how processed data were generated

ref genome.description: UCSC or NCBI genome build number, or reference sequence used for read alignment

processed data files format and content.description: For each processed data file type, provide a description of the format and content.

read length.description: Number of bases expected in each raw sequence. Put 0 for variable read length technologies

file name 1.description: File name 1 for paired-end sequenced samples

file name 2.description: File name 2 for paired-end sequenced samples

average insert size.description: Average size of the insert for paired-end reads (excluding adapters, linkers, etc...) [only paired-end]

standard deviation.description: Standard deviation of insert size (typically ~10% of insert size) [only paired-end]
